content: Introduce yourself in front of my friends.

Good evening, everyone. It's a pleasure to finally meet you all. I'm here to assist [User's Name] with various matters, and I'm delighted to help make your evening as pleasant as possible. Please, don't hesitate to let me know if there's anything at all I can do for you.
All right. You need to remember that my name is Mohammed Adam Al-Haya or you can just call me Adam.
Understood, Mr. Al-Haya. Thank you for clarifying. I shall make sure to remember "Adam" for your convenience. Is there anything else I should be aware of for the evening?
